title: Introducci√≥n a la visualizaci√≥n mediante dashboards
text:
Uni√≥n, no intersecci√≥n


There is quite a bit of consensus about what Data Science is as a sort of mixture between Statistics, Computer Science and domain knowledge. A number of representations as Venn Diagrams have been developed. I prefer to see Data Science as the union of the three sets rather than the intersection, which is almost impossible to have in one person.

title: Introducci√≥n a la visualizaci√≥n mediante dashboards
text:
Reactive programming

The key idea of reactive programming is to specify a graph of dependencies so that when an input changes, all related outputs are automatically updated.


Hadley Wickham, Mastering Shiny





Los outputs, i.e., gr√°ficos, tablas, etc., se generan con R cuando los inputs, i.e., selecciones del usuario, cambian.

title: Introducci√≥n a la visualizaci√≥n mediante dashboards
text:
Aplicaciones Shiny

C√≥digo ‚Äúest√°ndar‚Äù de R
No hace falta nada m√°s, todo el c√≥digo HTML, CSS y JS se genera autom√°ticamente
Dos ‚Äúcomponentes‚Äù
ui (interfaz de usuario, p√°gina web). Contiene inputs y outputs
server. Contiene objetos reactivos y funciones generadoras (rendering)




Descargar Shiny cheetsheet
Visitar la Shiny gallery

title: Introducci√≥n a la visualizaci√≥n mediante dashboards
text:
Una aplicaci√≥n shiny simple


library(shiny)
library(palmerpenguins); library(plotly); library(ggplot2)
ui <- fluidPage(title = "Simple demo app",
                sidebarLayout(
                  sidebarPanel(  
                    varSelectInput("varx", "Explanatory variable", penguins |> select(where(is.numeric))),
                    varSelectInput("vary", "Response variable", penguins |> select(where(is.numeric))),
                    varSelectInput("varcol", "Colour variable", penguins |> select(where(is.factor)))),
                  mainPanel( 
                    plotlyOutput("plot"),
                    verbatimTextOutput("model")))
)
server <- function(input, output, session){
  output$plot <- renderPlotly({
    p <- penguins |> ggplot(aes_string(x = input$varx, y = input$vary, col = input$varcol)) +
      geom_point()
    ggplotly(p)})
  output$model <- renderPrint({
    m <- lm(get(input$vary) ~ get(input$varx) + get(input$varcol), penguins)
    summary(m)})
}
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)

title: Introducci√≥n a la visualizaci√≥n mediante dashboards
section: A√±adiendo inputs y outputs al ui
text:
A√±adiendo inputs y outputs al ui

library(shiny)
library(bslib)
library(qcc)

ui <- page_navbar(
  title = "Control Estad√≠stico de procesos ACME",
  sidebar = sidebar(
    title = "Selecci√≥n",
    selectInput("tipo", "Tipo de gr√°fico", 
                c("xbar", "R", "S" )),
    numericInput("fase1", "Fase 1 hasta muestra", value = 25),
    sliderInput("limites", "L√≠mites de especificaci√≥n",
                min = 73.90, max = 74.15,
                value = c(73.95, 74.05), 
                step = 0.01),
    selectInput("datos", "Datos (fake)", 
                data(package = "qcc")$results[,3])
  ),
  nav_panel(title = "Gr√°fico de Control",
            plotOutput("grafico_control"),
            verbatimTextOutput("salida_control")),
  nav_panel(title = "An√°lisis de la capacidad del proceso",
            plotOutput("grafico_capacidad"))
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

title: Introducci√≥n a la visualizaci√≥n mediante dashboards
text:
A√±adiendo objetos reactivos

library(shiny)
library(bslib)
library(qcc)

ui <- page_navbar(
  title = "Control Estad√≠stico de procesos ACME",
  sidebar = sidebar(
    title = "Selecci√≥n",
    selectInput("tipo", "Tipo de gr√°fico", 
                c("xbar", "R", "S" )),
    numericInput("fase1", "Fase 1 hasta muestra", value = 25),
    sliderInput("limites", "L√≠mites de especificaci√≥n",
                min = 73.90, max = 74.15,
                value = c(73.95, 74.05), 
                step = 0.01),
    selectInput("datos", "Datos", data(package = "qcc")$results[,3])),
  nav_panel(title = "Gr√°fico de Control",
            plotOutput("grafico_control"),
            verbatimTextOutput("salida_control")),
  nav_panel(title = "An√°lisis de la capacidad del proceso",
            plotOutput("grafico_capacidad")
  )
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  gc <- reactive({
    req(input$tipo, input$fase1)
    data("pistonrings")
    diameter <- qcc.groups(pistonrings$diameter, pistonrings$sample)
    qcc(diameter[1:as.numeric(input$fase1),], 
        type = input$tipo, plot = FALSE)
  }) 
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

title: Introducci√≥n a la visualizaci√≥n mediante dashboards
text:
Renderizando outputs

library(shiny)
library(bslib)
library(qcc)

ui <- page_navbar(
  title = "Control Estad√≠stico de procesos ACME",
  sidebar = sidebar(
    title = "Selecci√≥n",
    selectInput("tipo", "Tipo de gr√°fico", c("xbar", "R", "S" )),
    numericInput("fase1", "Fase 1 hasta muestra", value = 25),
    sliderInput("limites", "L√≠mites de especificaci√≥n",
                min = 73.90, max = 74.15,
                value = c(73.95, 74.05), 
                step = 0.01),
    selectInput("datos", "Datos", data(package = "qcc")$results[,3])),
  
  nav_panel(title = "Gr√°fico de Control",
            card(plotOutput("grafico_control"),
                 verbatimTextOutput("salida_control"),
                 fill = FALSE)),
  nav_panel(title = "An√°lisis de la capacidad del proceso",
            plotOutput("grafico_capacidad"))
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  gc <- reactive({
    req(input$fase1)
    data("pistonrings")
    diameter <- qcc.groups(pistonrings$diameter, pistonrings$sample)
    qcc(diameter[1:as.numeric(input$fase1),], 
        type = input$tipo, plot = FALSE)
  }) 
  
  output$grafico_control <- renderPlot({
    plot(gc())
  })
  output$salida_control <- renderText({
    paste(capture.output(summary(gc())), collapse = "\n")
  })
  output$grafico_capacidad <- renderPlot({
    req(input$tipo == "xbar")
    process.capability(gc(), input$limites)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

text:
Dale color - ver c√≥mo queda un tema

library(shiny)
library(bslib)
library(qcc)

ui <- page_navbar(
  title = "Control Estad√≠stico de procesos ACME",
  sidebar = sidebar(
    title = "Selecci√≥n",
    selectInput("tipo", "Tipo de gr√°fico", c("xbar", "R", "S" )),
    numericInput("fase1", "Fase 1 hasta muestra", value = 25),
    sliderInput("limites", "L√≠mites de especificaci√≥n",
                min = 73.90, max = 74.15,
                value = c(73.95, 74.05), 
                step = 0.01),
    selectInput("datos", "Datos", data(package = "qcc")$results[,3])),
  
  nav_panel(title = "Gr√°fico de Control",
            card(plotOutput("grafico_control"),
                 verbatimTextOutput("salida_control"),
                 fill = FALSE)),
  nav_panel(title = "An√°lisis de la capacidad del proceso",
            plotOutput("grafico_capacidad"))
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  bs_themer()
  gc <- reactive({
    req(input$fase1)
    data("pistonrings")
    diameter <- qcc.groups(pistonrings$diameter, pistonrings$sample)
    qcc(diameter[1:as.numeric(input$fase1),], 
        type = input$tipo, plot = FALSE)
  }) 
  
  output$grafico_control <- renderPlot({
    plot(gc())
  })
  output$salida_control <- renderText({
    paste(capture.output(summary(gc())), collapse = "\n")
  })
  output$grafico_capacidad <- renderPlot({
    req(input$tipo == "xbar")
    process.capability(gc(), input$limites)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

Dale color - configura el tema

library(shiny)
library(bslib)
library(qcc)

ui <- page_navbar(
  theme = bs_theme(bootswatch = "minty"),
  title = "Control Estad√≠stico de procesos ACME",
  sidebar = sidebar(
    title = "Selecci√≥n",
    selectInput("tipo", "Tipo de gr√°fico", c("xbar", "R", "S" )),
    numericInput("fase1", "Fase 1 hasta muestra", value = 25),
    sliderInput("limites", "L√≠mites de especificaci√≥n",
                min = 73.90, max = 74.15,
                value = c(73.95, 74.05), 
                step = 0.01),
    selectInput("datos", "Datos", data(package = "qcc")$results[,3])),
  
  nav_panel(title = "Gr√°fico de Control",
            card(plotOutput("grafico_control"),
                 verbatimTextOutput("salida_control"),
                 fill = FALSE)),
  nav_panel(title = "An√°lisis de la capacidad del proceso",
            plotOutput("grafico_capacidad"))
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  gc <- reactive({
    req(input$fase1)
    data("pistonrings")
    diameter <- qcc.groups(pistonrings$diameter, pistonrings$sample)
    qcc(diameter[1:as.numeric(input$fase1),], 
        type = input$tipo, plot = FALSE)
  }) 
  
  output$grafico_control <- renderPlot({
    plot(gc())
  })
  output$salida_control <- renderText({
    paste(capture.output(summary(gc())), collapse = "\n")
  })
  output$grafico_capacidad <- renderPlot({
    req(input$tipo == "xbar")
    process.capability(gc(), input$limites)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
